casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mario Andrette McNEILL. No. 446A13-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 15, 2016. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. G. Glenn Gerding, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of January 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of January 2016."
